trans-unit.source: Uses the most current version for the Control Library COMCTL to provide control rendering with modern visual styling.
trans-unit.target: Uses the most current version for the Control Library COMCTL to provide control rendering with modern visual styling.

trans-unit.source: Windows XP Visual Styles
trans-unit.target: Windows XP Visual Styles

trans-unit.source: Controls if settings are saved when users shut down their computers.
trans-unit.target: Controls if settings are saved when users shut down their computers.

trans-unit.source: Save user settings on exit
trans-unit.target: Save user settings on exit

trans-unit.source: Prevents users from running multiple instances of the application. Default is cleared, which allows multiple instances of the application to be run.
trans-unit.target: Prevents users from running multiple instances of the application. Default is cleared, which allows multiple instances of the application to be run.

trans-unit.source: Single-instance application
trans-unit.target: Single-instance application

trans-unit.source: Enable the Visual Basic Application Framework for this project. In general, these settings get serialized into the myapp file.
trans-unit.target: Enable the Visual Basic Application Framework for this project. In general, these settings get serialized into the myapp file.

trans-unit.target: Application Framework

trans-unit.target: Application Framework settings.

trans-unit.target: Sets the form to be used as a splash screen for the application.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the method of identifying the logged-on user, when needed.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the method of identifying the logged-on user, when needed.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the application-wide HighDpiMode for the application. This setting can be programaticaly overriden through the ApplyApplicationDefaults event.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the application-wide HighDpiMode for the application. This setting can be programaticaly overriden through the ApplyApplicationDefaults event.

trans-unit.target: High DPI mode

trans-unit.source: Indicates which condition causes the application to shut down.
trans-unit.target: Indicates which condition causes the application to shut down.

trans-unit.source: Shutdown mode
trans-unit.target: Shutdown mode

trans-unit.source: Application-defined - Custom authentication implemented within the application.
trans-unit.target: Application-defined - Custom authentication implemented within the application.

trans-unit.source: Windows - Retrieve user info through My.User at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Windows - Retrieve user info through My.User at runtime.

trans-unit.source: DPI unaware, GDI scaled - Like DPI unaware but optimized for non-double-buffered Graphics content.
trans-unit.target: DPI unaware, GDI scaled - Like DPI unaware but optimized for non-double-buffered Graphics content.

trans-unit.source: DPI unaware - No scaling and assuming 100% scaling.
trans-unit.target: DPI unaware - No scaling and assuming 100% scaling.

trans-unit.source: Per monitor V2 - DPI detected on-launch and on-change including child windows
trans-unit.target: Per monitor V2 - DPI detected on-launch and on-change including child windows

trans-unit.source: Per monitor - DPI detected on-launch and on-change.
trans-unit.target: Per monitor - DPI detected on-launch and on-change.

trans-unit.source: System aware - Primary monitor's DPI is scale lead.
trans-unit.target: System aware - Primary monitor's DPI is scale lead.

trans-unit.source: Shut down only after the last form closes.
trans-unit.target: Shut down only after the last form closes.

trans-unit.source: Shut down when the main form closes.
trans-unit.target: Shut down when the main form closes.

trans-unit.source: Sets the minimum length of time, in milliseconds, for which the splash screen is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Sets the minimum length of time, in milliseconds, for which the splash screen is displayed.
